name: Mag. Sylvia Amann - inforelais
goal: inforelais – tailored consulting services – is an Austrian company founded by Sylvia Amann in the year 2000. Sylvia holds a degree from the Vienna University of Economics and Business Administration and from the Sorbonne University in Paris. She is an experienced policy adviser and EU expert with thematic focus on culture, creative industries as well as on urban and regional development. Her working languages are German, English and French.
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Culture, Culture and media, Digital economy and society, European Neighbourhood Policy, External Relations, International co-operation and development, Regional Policy, Research and innovation, Trade
euInitiatives:
EU Work Plan for Culture
OMC groups on Cultural and Creative Sectors
Creative FLIP project
European Capital of Culture
International strategies and cooperation in culture
Urban agenda and culture
Voices of culture - new policies in non-urban areas
